content.raw:
Adding this here means that every `ign-gazebo` GUI plugin will link against `ign-rendering`, even if not necessary. Changing it to this would make only the new plugin link against it:

```
diff -r 475876e4f395 src/gui/plugins/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/src/gui/plugins/CMakeLists.txt    Fri Jan 24 18:10:33 2020 -0800
+++ b/src/gui/plugins/CMakeLists.txt    Tue Jan 28 19:18:29 2020 -0800
@@ -34,7 +34,6 @@
   target_link_libraries(${library_name}
     PUBLIC
       ${PROJECT_LIBRARY_TARGET_NAME}
-      ${IGNITION-RENDERING_LIBRARIES}
       TINYXML2::TINYXML2
       ${gz_add_gui_library_PUBLIC_LINK_LIBS}
     PRIVATE
diff -r 475876e4f395 src/gui/plugins/grid_config/CMakeLists.txt
--- a/src/gui/plugins/grid_config/CMakeLists.txt        Fri Jan 24 18:10:33 2020 -0800
+++ b/src/gui/plugins/grid_config/CMakeLists.txt        Tue Jan 28 19:18:29 2020 -0800
@@ -1,4 +1,8 @@
 gz_add_gui_plugin(GridConfig
-  SOURCES GridConfig.cc
-  QT_HEADERS GridConfig.hh
+  SOURCES
+    GridConfig.cc
+  QT_HEADERS
+     GridConfig.hh
+  PUBLIC_LINK_LIBS
+    ${IGNITION-RENDERING_LIBRARIES}
 )
```

   target_link_libraries(${library_name}
     PUBLIC
       ${PROJECT_LIBRARY_TARGET_NAME}
-      ${IGNITION-RENDERING_LIBRARIES}
       TINYXML2::TINYXML2

@@ -1,4 +1,8 @@

+  SOURCES

+  PUBLIC_LINK_LIBS
